mapper.select: SELECT sys_role.role_id,sys_menu.menu_id,sys_menu.name,sys_menu.parent_id,sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.menu_code,sys_menu.path,sys_menu.component,sys_menu.request_url FROM sys_role LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id RIGHT JOIN sys_menu ON sys_menu.menu_id = sys_role_menu.menu_id WHERE sys_role.company_id = #{companyId} AND sys_menu.delete_status = 0 AND sys_role_menu.status = 1
